summary: An expedition to Titan uncovers an alien being, that goes on a rampage.
cast: Stan Ivar|Wendy Schaal|Lyman Ward|Robert Jaffe|Diane Salinger|Annette McCarthy|Marie Laurin|Klaus Kinski|John Stinson|Jim McKeny|Buckley Norris|Michael Griswold|David Moses|Earle Dugan|Thomas C. James|Eileen Seeley|Jeff Solomon
title: Creature
